ModMetaData.name: [B18] MAI Component Upgrades
ModMetaData.author: Newbeaveteran
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds in a few body parts for your MAIs.
Installing Parts Material Requirements(Instead of using medicines it will use this): SI-A100 USB (Tier 1) SI-B200 USB (Tier 2) SI-C300 USB (Tier 3)
Required Mods to work properly:
Misc. Core Misc. MAI
Current Parts: Battery Cell - Slows down Tiredness Enhanced Lenses - Increases Sight Enhanced Speaker - Increases Speech Precision Mechanical Shoulder - Increases Manipulation Combat Mechanical Shoulder - Combat Oriented Part Mechanical Arm(Spine) - Increases Manipulation Balanced Mechanical Leg - Increases Movement Armoured Limbs - Armoured Part
In-Progress(Because lazy): Specialized Chipset - Specializes yield on specific jobs and such.
